location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that Bruce make arrangements for the mining of Sulphur in the Dashtee [Dashti] district. Included is a copy of a letter from Edward Hutchins Bellasis to Francis Warden, dated 31 July 1816, discussing the sulphur required for the production of gunpowder.
